mention_address: "Manhattan Beach Pier, Manhattan Beach, Los Angeles County, California, 90266, United States of America"
attraction_reviewComments: Even though it's a pier it is worth a visit, especially of you get talking to some of the mre elderly fishermen - i met a real character.

Love the Manhattan Beach pier. Great walking, people watching, bird watching, and of course, watching the ocean and all it has to offer.
